docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 1--Defense of any country these days must in  clude protection against treason, sabotage and subversive foreign propaganda. The United States recognizes this and is preparing to suppress "Fifth Column" activities.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 3--Prince Stephan zu Schaumburg Lippe arrived here today on the Brazilian passenger ship Argentina on his way to Buenos Aires to be counselor of the embassy there. On board the ship he asked the elevator boy whether he could...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 3--Prince Stephan zu Schaumburg Lippe arrived here today on the Brazilian passenger ship Argentina on his way to Buenos Aires to be counselor of the embassy there. On board the ship he asked the elevator boy whether he could speak German. The boy replied No, to which the Prince said:
docs.abstract: Prince S zu Schaumburg Lippe tells boy he will need German language

headline.main: 'Better Learn German,' Nazi Says to a Brazilian

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 3 (AP)--Foreign Minister Cantilo reported tonight that a protest had been delivered in Berlin over the sinking by a U-boat of the Argentine freighter Uruguay, off the Spanish coast on May 27.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 3 (AP)--Foreign Minister Cantilo reported tonight that a protest had been delivered in Berlin over the sinking by a U-boat of the Argentine freighter Uruguay, off the Spanish coast on May 27.
docs.abstract: Argentine Govt protests to Germany on sinking
